Package com.intellij.util

Enum LineSeparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<LineSeparator>
      • com.intellij.util.LineSeparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<LineSeparator>

    public enum LineSeparator
extends java.lang.Enum<LineSeparator>

    Identifies a line separator: either Unix (\n), Windows (@{code \r\n}) or (possible not actual anymore) Classic Mac (\r).

    The intention is to use this class everywhere, where a line separator is needed, instead of just Strings.
